Package io.delta.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Scan  
    ScanBuilder  
    Snapshot
    Represents the snapshot of a Delta table.
    Table  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ScanFileReader
    Helper methods provided by the Delta core to read data and get the scan file status.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ColumnMappingMode
    Column mapping mode that indicates how the logical column names should be mapped to physical columns in the data Parquet file.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidExpressionException
    Thrown when the given Expression is not valid.
    TableNotFoundException
    Thrown when there is no Delta table at the given location.
    TableVersionNotFoundException
    Thrown when a particular version is not found in the Delta table
